intro: Celmisia holosericea, commonly known as the silky celmisia, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. Its leaves are lance-shaped and covered in fine, silky hairs, contributing to its distinctive appearance. Celmisia holosericea is often found in rocky or gravelly habitats and is an important component of New Zealand's native flora.
